page.title: Dillard's Loss Narrows But Off Estimates
page.text: NEW YORK (Reuters) - Dillard's Inc. <A HREF="http://www.investor.reuters.com/FullQuote.aspx?ticker=DDS.N target=/stocks/quickinfo/fullquote">DDS.N</A> on Wednesday reported a narrower quarterly loss as it cut costs, but a drop in same-store sales caused the latest results to miss Wall Street's estimates by a wide margin.
